description.value:
You spend some time in quiet contemplation and draw upon the mystic powers attained from your path to the divine, and exude an aura of divine calm and healing that washes over you and your companions. You take 10 minutes to recite, read or focus on your parableâ€™s lessons, and channel that into a power of healing. You may Refocus while taking this activity.

At the end of the ten minutes, roll a @Check[religion|dc:15] Religion check against a DC 15. On a success, roll an [[/r 8d4]] to determine a pool of healing. On a critical success, you add 16 to this pool. You can then distribute this amount as healing to any number of creatures who are near enough to hear you.

If you are an Expert in Religion, you can roll @Check[religion|dc:20] against a DC 20 to increase the roll by an [[/r 12d4]]{additional 4d4 (total 12d4)} and add another 8 to the pool on a critical success. If you are a Master, you can roll @Check[religion|dc:30] against a DC 30 to increase the roll by [[/r 16d4]]{another increment (total 16d4) } of the same amount, and if you are Legendary, you can roll against @Check[religion|dc:40] a DC 40 to increase it [[/r 20d4]]{once more (total 20d4)}.

Instead of rolling for the pool of healing, you can instead choose to spend an additional 50 minutes for a total of an hour. If you do, you gain a pool as if you critically succeeded and rolled the maximum amount on the dice.

Once a creature has benefited from the healing, they are temporarily immune to the healing for 1 hour.
